name: Wikis
body:
This is a collection of Wikis and Tutorials, a few written by me, most compiled from prior authors and sources.

* **Scripts, Regs, & Configs**
	* **Explorer**
		* _Add Create Restore Point to Context_Menu_
		* _Add Google Drive to Explorer_
		* _Add ownCloud to Explorer_
		* _Instructions_
	* **Hyper-V**
		* _Add Hyper-V Manager to Control Panel_
	* **Notepad++**
		* _Replace Notepad with Notepad++_
	* **OpenSSL**
		* _Custom OpenSSL config (with commands at bottom)_
	* **PuTTY**
		* **_Multi-Hop_**
			* _HowTo Multi-Hop SSH (with registry output)_
			* _HowTo Multi-Hop SSH (without registry output)_
		* **_Serial_**
			* _Serial Session_
			* _TFTPd32 (config)_
	* **System Restore**
		* **_Windows 10_**
			* _Context Menu_
			* _RP Instant_
			* _RP w/ Description_
			* _RP w/ Description Prompt_
			* _System Startup_
* **Wikis & HowTos**
	* **DirecTV DVR Transfer**
		* _DirecTV DVR HDD Transfer_
	* **OpenSSL**
		* **_Documentation_**
			* _Certificates HowTo_
			* _Crypto Man Page_
			* _Keys HowTo_
			* _OpenSSL Cookbook_
			* _OpenSSL Man Page_
			* _Proxy Certificates HowTo_
			* _SSL Man Page_
	* **OpenVPN**
		* **_Documentation_**
			* _Android Certificate Toast Removal_
			* _Connect Android_
			* _OpenVPN_Firewall_
			* _OpenVPN Man Page_
		* **_HowTos_**
			* _OpenVPN HowTo_
			* _Server HowTo (Streamlined) [OpenWrt Wiki]_
	* **Security**
		* _Modsecurity Handbook_
	* **WRT1900ac**
		* **_TFTP Recovery_**
			* _HowTo_
			* _Serial Port_
			* _Serial Session (reg)_
			* _TFTPd32 (config)_		
		* **_U-boot Recovery_**
			* _HowTo_
			* _Wiki_
	* **XboxOne**
		* _Xbox One HDD Replacement_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
